Back on the hill, Gangon was still sitting in the shair tied up, BrightBlade
wasn't coming. Gangon started to cry, he was lonely and tied up. Sinesis and
Sinister decided that this battle wasn't worth it and headed to the top of a
hill in the distance. They both say down, one on each side of Gangon. They
slowly looked at Gangon. Sinister and Sinesis looked at each other. Gangon
didn't notice them until they were standing right in front of him, each one
of them holding their special weapon. Gangon looked at them in terror.
Sinister stepped around behind Gangon. Sinesis did as well. they both pulled
back their weapons.

"Wait! I was just waiting for my Girlfriend!" Gangon said.

"Well when she dies you will be reunited!" Sinesis screamed.

"Threats, always die." Sinister said.

"I'm not a threat! I'm not any good!" Gangon said.

"Then you need to die!" Sinesis said. Gangon sighed, his plea for mercy
bombing. Sinister and Sinesis, at the same time, plunged their swords right
through the back of the chair and out the small bot Gangon's chest, the
ropes were cut. Sinister and Sinesis removed their swords, Gangon fell to
the ground, a puddle of mech fluid spilling around him. Gangon sighed.
Sinister and Sinesis climbed down the hill.

"Leave him to suffer!" Sinesis said. Gangon gasped repeatedly, not able to
breath anymore. Gangon grabbed a large maple leaf, writing on it his love
for BrightBlade with his blood. Gangon sent it by scanning it, the message
sent to BrightBlade. He sent anothe rone, saying to Hell Beast that he was
sorry for failing him. Gangon collapsed, laying on the hill and slowly
dying. Gangon rose long enough to grab his machine gun from cyberspace and
colapsed again. Gangon blinked a few times, his mech fluid getting into his
eyes, he just waited to die, waited to live, he didn't know what to do
anymore. Sinesis and Sinister laughed and continued to walk on. Lightmare
showed up, a bit too late to help. Lightmare walked down and looked Sinesis
and Sinister in the eyes.

"Hey, sorry I missed your slaughter, i wanted to help like I did in the last
2 slaughters. Say, can I hang around you? I'll be your servant, I have
nothing else to do." Lightmare said. Sinesis and Sinister looked at each
other. They both grabbed Lightmare and forced her over to the tree.
Lightmare pulled her blaster out but Sinister slapped it away. Lightmare
struggled but it was no use. Sinister walked around to the back of the tree,
Sinesis staying in front.

"Nobody is around to help you now!" Sinesis said. Lightmare groaned in pain
as Sinesis punched her. Sinesis' sword came out of the back of the tree,
Sinister's sword coming out of the front. Lightmare was pinned 2 ways.
Sinesis and Sinister laughed, removing their swords. They drug Lightmare to
the top of the hill and laid her next to Gangon.

"This will mean we have destroyed 3 threats!" Sinister said. They both
laughed and walked away. Gangon and Lightmare caught a brief glimpse of each
other, and then rolled over. Lightmare's mech fluid pouring out into the
puddle of Gangon's, the whole hill was flooded and red...
----- Original Message -----

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
